titleStmt.title: An antidote agaynst poperie: most necessarie for all in this back-slyding age. Wherein 1. The trueth is confirmed, by authoritie of scriptures, witnessing of antiquitie, and confession of the popish partie. 2. Popish scripturall arguments are answered, by the exposition both of father and of their own doctours / by William Guild.
titleStmt.author: Guild, William, 1586-1657.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages tightly bound and have faded print.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
